content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

The main target image shows two distinct structures:

## Structure 1 (Left side):
This is a small arrangement made of several blocks, including:
- Green rectangular blocks (vertical)
- Orange triangular blocks
- An orange cylindrical block
- Orange triangular ramps

## Structure 2 (Right side): 
This is a tower-like structure with 4 layers:
- Bottom layer: Blue cube and yellow cube side by side with a red cube and orange cube above them
- Second layer: Orange cube and green horizontal rectangular block
- Third layer: Blue cube
- Top layer: Red cube

## Block Count and Selection

Based on the block dictionary image, I'll identify the required blocks by their indices.

### For Structure 1 (Left to right, bottom to top):
- Orange triangular blocks (indices 13, 14, 15, 16 - different orientations)
- Green vertical rectangular blocks (indices 7, 8, 9)
- Orange cylindrical block (index 10)

### For Structure 2 (Bottom to top):
- Yellow cube (index 5)
- Blue cube (index 1) - appears twice in the structure
- Orange cube (index 3)
- Red cube (index 4) - appears twice in the structure
- Green horizontal rectangular block (index 6)

## Assembly Order

I'll provide assembly instructions for both structures, starting with the tower (Structure 2) followed by the smaller arrangement (Structure 1).

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 5 (Yellow cube - bottom layer, right side of Structure 2)
    Step2: Move block with index 1 (Blue cube - bottom layer, left side of Structure 2)
    Step3: Move block with index 3 (Orange cube - second layer, left side of Structure 2)
    Step4: Move block with index 4 (Red cube - second layer, right side of Structure 2)
    Step5: Move block with index 6 (Green rectangular block - third layer of Structure 2)
    Step6: Move block with index 1 (Blue cube - fourth layer of Structure 2)
    Step7: Move block with index 4 (Red cube - top layer of Structure 2)
    Step8: Move block with index 7 (Green vertical rectangular block - left side of Structure 1)
    Step9: Move block with index 10 (Orange cylindrical block - center of Structure 1)
    Step10: Move block with index 8 (Green vertical rectangular block - right side of Structure 1)
    Step11: Move block with index 13 (Orange triangular block - left back of Structure 1)
    Step12: Move block with index 15 (Orange triangular block - center top of Structure 1)
    Step13: Move block with index 16 (Orange triangular ramp - right side of Structure 1)
}
```

This assembly order builds the tower first from bottom to top, then constructs the smaller arrangement from left to right.
